summary: This document is an email communication from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, dated September 7, 2010. The email emphasizes the confidentiality of the information contained within and suggests that it may be attorney-client privileged. It also includes a warning against unauthorized use or disclosure of the communication.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating the communication is confidential and may be privileged.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein, suggesting a professional relationship.

keyFacts: The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
Unauthorized use or disclosure of the email is prohibited.
The email contains a warning to notify the sender if received in error.
